backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister with an empty actor.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short summaries of all major frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color tokens, theming variables, and dark mode variants.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router and maps routes to Home, About, Programs, Events, and Contact pages.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with branding, navigation links, social icons, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with logo, desktop menu, and mobile sheet menu highlighting active routes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, state, and login flow.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future React Query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes, plus base typography and layout styles.
frontend/src/layouts/AppLayout.tsx: Provides the main app layout with top navigation, footer, and routed page content via Outlet.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it in React Query and Internet Identity providers and loading global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Displays YouthHub's story, mission, vision, and values using styled sections and card components.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Shows contact methods including email, phone, address, and office hours using card-based UI.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Lists upcoming events with details and badges, rendering them as styled cards with metadata.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a hero section and overview of core programs using cards and calls to action.
frontend/src/pages/ProgramsPage.tsx: Renders a Programs page with a grid of program cards, each showing an icon, description, age range, and schedule, plus a call‑to‑action section.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, radii, animations, plugins, and content paths for the frontend.
project_state.json: Stores the project's state, including feature definitions, generated image requirements, and metadata for the youth organization app.
